item.description: Come on over for some coffee and a snack with your kids and learn what Parents Without Partners has to offer you and your child(ren). The kids can play together while we talk with the parents. March is Founder's month, so let's get together and celebrate being single parents. Invite your single parent friends to come with you to meet us and find out about the group.
item.how_to_find_us: Main/large meeting room. Turn right after entering the library. The meeting room is at the end of the hallway.
item.name: Open House for prosective members and members
